version_description: Optimisation for iPhone X
Thanks for all your feedback. Dropbox is now working as expected.
Optimisation for iPhone X
Thanks for all your feedback. Dropbox is now working as expected.
- Dropbox & Drive are now working better than before !

Our goal is to create the most complete Scanner app on iPhone.
Please find in this update new awesome features that are making our app even more powerful.
- completely new UI and UX, discover the most beautiful and useful scanner app !
- new signing and highlighting features
- new sharing partner : Box.net
- multi-pages management improved
- we fixed some crashes
And as always, if you need help with subscription, premium or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support

Our goal is to create the most complete Scanner app on iPhone.
Please find in this update new awesome features that are making our app even more powerful.
- completely new UI and UX, discover the most beautiful and useful scanner app !
- new signing and highlighting features
- new sharing partner : Box.net
- multi-pages management improved
- we fixed some crashes
And as always, if you need help with subscription, premium or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support

Santa brings some bug fixes to you:

- He fixed a crash occurring if the camera access was denied
- And another crash happening for a small portion of you when saving a new document

Happy scanning & Happy new year!

Santa brings some bug fixes to you:

- He fixed a crash occurring if the camera access was denied
- And another crash happening for a small portion of you when saving a new document

Happy scanning & Happy new year!

- Fixed the auto capture mode
- Small performance improvements

New features on this version:

* You now now add, remove and reorder pages within a document
* You can export a PDF with a password
